svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Gini Index around 2015 vs. Gini Index around 2000
Estimates are based on household survey data of either incomes or consumption. Countries are only shown where
comparable surveys falling within three years of each reference year were available.
Source: Povcal (2018), The Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017), Kanbur et al (2017) Table 1.B
